question: Hailakandi district, sometimes seen in news, is located in which of the following states?
explanation: The government policy think tank, Niti Aayog has recently released Delta ranking report. In it,  the Hailakandi district of Assam has been ranked first among the 112 aspirational districts of India, followed by Kondagaon district of Chhattisgarh. Hailakandi has made a giant leap from 52nd position to no. 1 position on the basis of its performance during November-December 2018 and January 2019. For securing the first rank as an aspirational district, Hailakandi will be given an allocation of Rs. 10 crore.
